sentences.en: Be - cause man hastens decrepitude and decay by holding the thought of old age always before him.
sentences.cn: 因为人类总是抱着过去的旧思想加速着他们的衰老过程.

sentences.en: But must be a body of son, otherwise double ly decrepitude.
sentences.cn: 但必须要保持处子之身, 否则会加倍的衰老.

sentences.en: Contain the essence, SOD of abundant grape, mighty anti - oxygenation defer decrepitude.
sentences.cn: 富含葡萄籽精华 、 SOD, 超强的 抗氧化 作用于延缓衰老.

sentences.en: Effects of Aerobic Interval Exercises with Light Intensity on Anti oxidation and Anti decrepitude.
sentences.cn: 轻度间隔性有氧运动的抗氧化及抗衰老作用研究.

sentences.en: If decrepitude is driven by an overactive immune system, then it is treatable.
sentences.cn: 如果是由于过分活跃的免疫系统所致, 那么衰老是可以医治的.

sentences.en: It can decelerate decrepitude, brighten skin, fade mark and make skin white, tender and healthy.
sentences.cn: 它可消除衰老皮肤, 令其健康细腻;有淡化印迹, 令皮肤变白 、 变嫩之功效.

sentences.en: Staying youth can be likened to climbing steep hill, while negligence will lead to decrepitude overnight.
sentences.cn: 保持青春已如爬坡, 任由衰老会一泻千里.

sentences.en: The building had a general air of decrepitude and neglect.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑看上去破旧失修，无人照管。

sentences.en: The photosynthetic rate descend gradually because of the decrepitude of the leaf.
sentences.cn: 后期由于叶子的衰老,光合速率逐渐下降.
